name: bean sprout (hazza bee)
description:
explore the world as sprout and her adorable companion as you navigate your way through a mysterious world trying to clense the darkness that has taken a hold over it. controlls - WASD  a game made by: 

ollie, brooke, callum, joe and me :)

P.S: this is a project for our first ever game jam we put (and are stillputting) alot of love into it as aspiring game makers.
